title: DevOps & CI/CD Quiz
description: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines and deployment strategies

questions.question: What is Docker?
questions.explanation: Docker is a containerization platform that packages applications and their dependencies into containers.

questions.question: What does CI/CD stand for?
questions.explanation: CI/CD stands for Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment, automating the software delivery process.

questions.question: Kubernetes is only for Docker containers.
questions.explanation: While Kubernetes is commonly used with Docker, it can orchestrate other container runtimes as well.
